content.prompt: The exterior decoration of the Treasury at Petra attests to the manner in which Nabataean architects were influenced by the

choices.label: monumental entrances of New Kingdom Egyptian temples
hybrid animal forms that guarded Assyrian citadels

unit.text: 7: West and Central Asia, 500 BCE - 1980 CE

topic.text: 7.3: Interactions Within and Across Cultures in West and Central Asian Art

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Explain the influence of a specific work of art (or group of related works of art) on other artistic production within or across cultures.
